duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolve inquiries from sales/use tax returns customers
Preparation, review, and filing of multi-jurisdictional sales/use, business and occupation, and gross receipts tax returns for monthly, quarterly, semi-annual, and annual filings
Detail and process-oriented jurisdictional returns set up on behalf of customers
Manage workload effectively to meet deadlines
Identify areas of improvement and efficiencies in compliance processes

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree (B.S. or B.A.) from an accredited college or university, or equivalent career experience
